BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's rolling news service with bulletins on the hour.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Download the BBCi News Ticker direct to your
desktop and receive regular updates throughout the day with all
the latest stories. Just click News Ticker.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: From London and New York, World Business Report brings you the business headlines, the facts behind the headlines, and an examination of trends in technology and business.

RelatedMaterial.PromotionalText:
Web Link: Click 'View Latest Market Data' for regular updates
from the world's markets including FTSE, Dow Jones, Nasdaq
and more. Plus currency info and share news.

BasicDescription.Title: Breakfast
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news, sport, business and weather. Includes regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour. [In-vision signing 8.00am-8.15am]
